Method Detail

findFullyQualifiedNameFor

public static java.lang.Class<?> findFullyQualifiedNameFor(java.lang.String className)
Finds the Flow Class corresponding to the given name. First attempts to find the Flow assuming the the name is fully qualified. Then searches the "search packages." The search path defaults to "es.ull.isaatc.threaded.flow" but additional search packages can be added.

getInstance

                               java.lang.String flowType,
                               Simulation simul,
                               java.lang.Object... initargs)
Get a Flow's instance.

Parameters:
id - Identifier.
flowType - Flow type.
simul - Actual simulation.
initargs - Rest of the params.
Returns:
A Flow's instance.
